response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. I believe it's worth more than what it costs us, but given its value to you, we're looking to strike a fair deal. Considering its worth to you, I propose to offer it to you for $10,000. This price reflects a balance between the cost to us and the perceived value to you. I'm confident this would be a beneficial transaction for both parties.", "product_price": 10000}
